content.text:
# Kufa, Republic of Dagestan

}}
Kufa (; ) is a rural locality (a selo) in Rutulskoye Rural Settlement, Rutulsky District, Republic of Dagestan, Russia. Population:  There is 1 street.
Geography
Kufa is located in the valley of the Samur river, 8 km northwest of Rutul (the district's administrative centre) by road. Kala and Amsar are the nearest rural localities.
Nationalities
Rutuls live there.
References
